BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Uniform land use review procedure application no. 010126 PCM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning the site selection and acquisition of real property located at 35 East  4th Street, Borough of Manhatttan, Council District no. 2, for use as a water tunnel (Shaft #31B) for water tunnel No. 3.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.

A proposal by the Department of Citywide Administrative Services, pursuant to §195 of the New York City Charter, for the acquisition of office space located at 9 Metrotech Center, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 35, for use by Human Resources Administtration.  (Non-ULURP no.20025140 PXK)
